title: Tartar Sauce
summaries: The Tartar Sauce is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Mini Minotaur to follow the player around. It is dropped from Iron and Mythril Crates with an approximative chance of 4.8*6/125 (4.8%). The pet's yellow eyes glow in the dark, but it produces no other light. When the player gets too far away from it, it will twirl its axe and fly to them.

statistics.Sell: 2
